title: Geekbench 5
description: Geekbench provides a comprehensive set of benchmarks designed to quickly and accurately measure CPU and GPU Compute performance. Designed to make benchmarks easy to run and easy to understand, Geekbench takes the guesswork out of producing robust and reliable benchmark results.

title: Codigo de radio para Renault
description:
Sometimes during the repair of the car, the battery is disconnected. After battery reconnected the radio is protected by a four digit code.
If you don't remember radio code or lost it, you can recover it quickly and easily with this app using precode.
Note: precode is located on the rear side of your radio.

To find the precode:
- Turn the radio on and hold at the same time the button 1 and 6 (In some cases, it is necessary to remove the radio)
- See the unit precode. The precode consists of 1 letter and 3 digits. For example: V248, D833, H635
- Input precode to this app

How to input radio code ?
1. With Preset Buttons
･ Press 1 Button repeatedly for 1st digit to be displayed
･ Press 2 Button repeatedly for 2nd digit to be displayed
･ Press 3 Button repeatedly for 3rd digit to be displayed
･ Press 4 Button repeatedly for 4th digit to be displayed
･ Press and HOLD preset button 6 (or 5) to store your code (10 seconds)

2. With Stalk Control
･ Press switch on the CD radio. When CD will display 0 0 0 0.
･ Rotate the thumb wheel for the 1st digit. Next press the bottom button to move on.
･ Rotate the thumb wheel for the 2nd digit. Next press the bottom button to move on.
･ Rotate the thumb wheel for the 3rd digit. Next press the bottom button to move on.
･ Rotate the thumb wheel for the 4th digit.
･ Press and hold the bottom button button to finish.

3. With Remote Control
･ Press the [ ¬] button then rotate the thumb wheel for 1st digit
･ Press the [ ¬] button then rotate the thumb wheel for 2nd digit
･ Press the [ ¬] button then rotate the thumb wheel for 3rd digit
･ Press the [ ¬] button then rotate the thumb wheel for 3rd digit
･ Press and hold the [ ¬] button to store the code (10 seconds)

If you experience difficulties with the app, please contact us.
support@kcandr.ru

Happy users:
- Jampesz from Denmark: "Thank you. This program save my nights. Yesterday need to change my battery and of course my radio reset too. But this program solved my problem. Simple, cheap, and usefull."
- Darren: "Perfect. Many thanks."
- Ttarvis from United Kingdom: "Perfect app! Helped a lot!"
- Alfmuenchen from Germany: "App works perfectly. I was spared discussion and stress with the dealer. Only recommendable. Thank you very much"
- Gökhan from Turkey: "Renault services require $25. The program is only $2. Thank you very much"
- se7ennio from Turkey: "It really worked. I ripped off the tape section, wrote the last four parts of the serial number, gave the code and it's done. Thank you."
- Rodrigo Dido from Brazil: "Show Works great !!!!"
- Rosouzadocarmo from Brazil: "Congratulations. It works on the face."

title: Dual Space Pro - No Ads
description:
Dual Space - Login Multi Accounts & Parallel App

Do you have to use 2 phone to login your secondary account in social network or message app?

Do you have to switch different account of one app on your phone?

You have many friends at work, friends at school, ... and need to manage them with difference account?

Now, with Dual Space, your problem is solved. You can use one phone to login many social account at same time.

Dual Space just only 4Mb but allow you to login many social network and message app. You will not need to worry about free space.

Dual Space Highlight:

• Support over 20+ app: Facebook, Twitter, Messenger, WhatsApp, SnapChat, Instagram...
• Manage difference circle of friends
• Support 24/7, you can request new app
• Super small size: Only 4Mb 
• Extra feature: Private Browser and Private Note
• Allow you to set passcode, keep your privacy
• File Transfer: import sensitive photos, videos, files and keep them private.
• built-in video & audio player

Enjoy all in one app!

contact us: suppervk6666@gmail.com

title: Boris and the Dark Survival
description:
Play as Boris the Wolf, the cartoon companion of Bendy, as you hunt throughout the abandoned cartoon studio for the supplies Boris needs to keep going. You’re not alone! The monstrous Ink Demon stalks you at every turn. Beware the sound of his beating heart as he creeps up from behind and catches you in his dripping gaze. No where is safe. Yet secrets lie in wait for those adventurous enough to seek them out.

• Outrun the Ink Demon or become his next victim.
• Scavenge for supplies and keep yourself on the move.
• Carefully watch your stamina and stop to eat every chance you get.
• Discover hidden unlockables stashed away in the shadows.
• Unveil more of the shadowy backstory of Joey Drew Studios.

Will you brave the evil lurking in the studio? Will you conquer this Dark Survival?

Boris is counting on you.

title: My Town : Pré-escola
description:
Bem-vindo(a) ao My Town: Pré-escola. Crie, imagine e brinque na sua própria pré-escola. Tenha horas do diversão com pura imaginação na área de recreação, visitando a enfermeira da escola, aprendendo, lanchando coisas deliciosas na hora do intervalo e muito mais!

DE QUE SE TRATA O MY TOWN?
Nossos jogos promovem a imaginação e a diversão. Criando um ambiente livre de estresse livre sem limites, regras e objetivos, permitimos que as crianças criem uma quantidade infinita de histórias e de aventuras. O My Town é uma casa de boneca digital definitiva baseado em lugares do dia a dia que as nossas crianças encontram no mundo real.

O QUE HÁ DE NOVO?
Percebemos o quanto você adorou o novo recurso de emoções que apresentamos; e adicionamos a todos os personagens do My Town: Pré-escola. Então agora as crianças podem chorar na enfermaria da escola, rir na área de recreação ou se maravilhar em ver as novas roupas e brinquedos!

** Queremos agradecer a todos os nossos 3,5 milhões de fãs! **

JOGUE, IMAGINE e DESCUBRA
A nova pré-escola está agora aberta e pronta para que você explorar e descobrir. Encontre atividades e adereços para completar a sua aventura. Vista as crianças, leve-as ao banheiro, faça curativos quando elas se machucarem ou divirta-se na hora do lanche. Tudo é possível 

DESTAQUES
-8 locais de diversão que incluem cantinho do saber, banheiro, enfermaria, quintal, refeitório, quarto de descanso
-Novas emoções adicionadas a todos os personagens. Agora todos os personagens podem rir, chorar, sorrir, ficar zangado, se surpreender.
-Muitos personagens como professores da pré-escola, crianças e pais
-A enfermaria da escola onde você pode examinar as crianças, fazer curativo nelas e até mesmo examinar os olhos delas para ver se precisam usar óculos
-Roupas da estação para todas as crianças  e vários trajes para elas vestirem

FAIXA ETÁRIA RECOMENDADA:
As crianças e os adultos  podem jogar juntos. O jogo é feito para crianças de 3 anos jogarem com seus pais ou de 12 anos jogarem sozinhas. Controle parental completo e sem compras dentro do app ou anúncios o que faz com que nossos jogos sejam um ambiente seguro para as crianças


DIGA-NOS A SUA OPINIÃO!
Amamos ouvir as seus ideias e queremos ajudar onde for necessário. Você pode juntar-se a nós ou contatar-nos no
